io.rouz.flo.TaskContext

  • Packages that use TaskContext 
    Package Description
    io.rouz.flo  
    io.rouz.flo.context  

    • Uses of TaskContext in io.rouz.flo

      Classes in io.rouz.flo that implement TaskContext 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TaskContextWithTask
      A TaskContext that overrides currentTask() to return a specific TaskId.
      Methods in io.rouz.flo that return TaskContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TaskContext TaskContext.async(Executor executor)
      Create an asynchronous TaskContext that executes all evaluation on the given Executor.
      TaskContext TaskContext.Value.context()
      The TaskContext that created this value.
      static TaskContext TaskContext.inmem()
      Create a default, in-memory, immediate TaskContext.
      Methods in io.rouz.flo with parameters of type TaskContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default <T> TaskContext.Value<T> TaskContext.evaluateInternal(Task<T> task, TaskContext context)
      A variant of evaluate(Task) that allows the caller to specify the TaskContext that should be used within the graph during evaluation.
      static <T,U,V> TaskContext.Value<V> Values.mapBoth(TaskContext context, TaskContext.Value<T> first, TaskContext.Value<U> second, BiFunction<? super T,? super U,? extends V> fn)
      Maps a function over two TaskContext.Values returning a new TaskContext.Value of the result which only becomes available when both inputs have completed.
      T OpProvider.provide(TaskContext taskContext)
      Creates a new operator instance of type T.
      static <T> Collector<TaskContext.Value<T>,?,TaskContext.Value<List<T>>> Values.toValueList(TaskContext context)
      A Collector that collects a Stream of TaskContext.Values into a TaskContext.Value of a List.

    • Uses of TaskContext in io.rouz.flo.context

      Classes in io.rouz.flo.context that implement TaskContext 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AsyncContext
      A TaskContext that executes evaluation and Value computations on a given Executor.
      class  ForwardingTaskContext
      A TaskContext that forwards calls.
      class  InMemImmediateContext
      A TaskContext that evaluates tasks immediately and memoizes results in memory.
      class  InstrumentedContext
      A TaskContext that instruments the task expansion and invocation process.
      class  MemoizingContext
      A flo TaskContext that allows task types to define custom memoization strategies.
